Using Font Awesome In 2017

14 July 2017 1 min

It has come to my attention that I should move into the new age so to speak of web development. I managed to teach myself SASS and get better with GIT, ha get, all jokes aside I need to keep my skills up. So, over the next few days, weeks and even months I'll be implementing Font Awesome into my site.

I've always had trouble with things like the Hamburger menu, I guess because I always tried using an image for it. You know instead of using a CSS Icon Set. I'll also be trying to blog the experience more so I can get some actual content on this site.

I've already started filling out my portfolio. Although it's mostly just designs that I made up in Photoshop. I've also popped open Illustrator to make some logos but I don't feel they are that great to share yet. I mostly just keep trying to slog away to keep busy on something creative.

I do still run my YouTube channel as well where I upload vlogs and short Overwatch clips. I have already uploaded more videos this year than all of last year put together and depending on if the Dragon Con trip works out I'll have that on my channel. Along with plenty of photos from the Con on this site.

Whatever happens, the next 5 and a half months thank you for taking the time to read this little update post. That all it seems I ever do on this site anymore. (lol)

Until Next Time, peace!
- Ben Sanders

P.S. If you enjoyed this post don't forget to share it on all the socials and comment below! I looke forward to conversing with you all in the comments.
